com.frankly.franklysdk.service

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frankly.franklysdk.service.Manager
      • com.frankly.franklysdk.service.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends Manager
    The main interface for retrieving and updating Users.

      • get

        public User get(long id)
         throws IOException,
                AuthenticationException,
                ParseException
        Retrieves the User with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the User to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The User with the given ID.
        Throws:
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Parsing either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the User returned from the server failed.

      • get

        public User get(long id,
                boolean skipUpdate)
         throws IOException,
                AuthenticationException,
                ParseException
        Retrieves the User with the given ID, and requests that any potential asynchronous update of the retrieved User is skipped. Note: This method should only be used instead of get(long) when it is very likely that multiple calls for the same user by ID may be done within a short timespan (such as when we render User information in a ListView).
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the User to retrieve.
        skipUpdate - Whether any potential asynchronous update of the retrieved User should be skipped.
        Returns:
        The User with the given ID.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the User returned from the server.

      • getAnnouncers

        public List<User> getAnnouncers(Room room)
                         throws IOException,
                                AuthenticationException,
                                ParseException
        Retrieves all Users that are defined as announcers in the given Room.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the announcers of.
        Returns:
        All Users that are defined as announcers in the given Room.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of one of the announcers returned from the server.

      • getBanInfo

        public BanInfo getBanInfo()
                   throws IOException,
                          AuthenticationException,
                          IllegalArgumentException
        Retrieves the BanInfo for the current User.
        Returns:
        The BanInfo for the current User.
        Throws:
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        IllegalArgumentException - No BanInfo could be found for the current User.

      • getParticipants

        public List<User> getParticipants(Room room)
                           throws IOException,
                                  AuthenticationException,
                                  ParseException,
                                  StorageModificationException
        Retrieves all Users that are participating in the given Room.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the participating Users of.
        Returns:
        All Users that are participating in the given Room.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of one of the participating Users returned from the server.
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add or update) failed.

      • getSubscribers

        public List<User> getSubscribers(Room room)
                          throws IOException,
                                 AuthenticationException,
                                 ParseException,
                                 StorageModificationException
        Retrieves all Users that are subscribed to the given Room.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the subscribed Users of.
        Returns:
        All Users that are subscribed to the given Room.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of one of the subscribed Users returned from the server.
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add or update) failed.

      • update

        public void update(User user)
            throws IOException,
                   AuthenticationException,
                   ParseException
        Updates the given User with the information contained within it.
        Parameters:
        user - The User with updated information.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the User returned from the server after updating.

      • uploadUserAvatar

        public String uploadUserAvatar(android.content.Context context,
                               android.content.Intent dataIntent)
                        throws IOException,
                               AuthenticationException
        Uploads the image specified in the Intent, specified by the data Uri of the Intent or an extra called "data" which stores a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context with which to associate this request.
        dataIntent - The Intent containing either the data Uri of the Intent or an extra called "data" which stores a Bitmap.
        Returns:
        The remote URL String where the user avatar is stored.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
